mapper.sql:
FROM product a WHERE 1=1 AND DelNy = #{shDelNy}
AND seq LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND product_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND brand_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.seq ,a.product_name ,a.price ,a.discount_percent ,a.reserve ,(select nation from origin aa WHERE 1=1 AND a.origin_seq = aa.seq) as origin ,a.deliverycost ,a.deliveryinfo ,a.option_code ,a.newNy ,a.bestNy ,a.manufacturer_code ,a.brand_code
ORDER BY a.seq DESC

SELECT a.seq ,a.product_name ,a.price ,a.discount_percent ,a.reserve ,(select nation from origin aa WHERE 1=1 AND a.origin_seq = aa.seq) as origin ,a.deliverycost ,a.deliveryinfo ,a.option_code ,a.newNy ,a.bestNy ,a.manufacturer_code ,a.brand_code FROM product a WHERE 1=1 AND a.seq = #{seq}
